ygData.subject: Re: AAAAAKKKK!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Message: 1 Date: Mon, 11 Oct 1999 00:13:28 -0400 From: Bob  Subject: AAAAAKKKK!!!! ... Join the club.  :)  I guess you weren t playing EQ
ygData.messageBody:
Message: 1
Date: Mon, 11 Oct 1999 00:13:28 -0400
From: Bob <vampyre@...>
Subject: AAAAAKKKK!!!!

>I don't know what happened but I cant seem to get into the game anymore.
>After I select my guy, I hit enter world and then after about a minute, I
>get the 'Server not responding" message. I have reinstalled and repatched
>the game.

Join the club. :) I guess you weren't playing EQ that first week they
released the game. That message happened everyday. :P Nothing to do but
wait it out...either the EQ log-in server is down or some node along the way
is holding you up. As much as I'd like to bitch about it when it
happens...equipment fails so... *shrug* Time to finally go to the restroom
then heh

You can also get that EverMon thingie that will ping the EQ servers and tell
you when it's up.

-- Lim'Dul
